name: Intiqaam
description:
BEST PLAYED IN WINDOWS BUILD 

If you like the game in browser mode then please download and play the rest of it
because FOG Quality is better in windows build and also overall lighting is much better in windows build

well I removed the web build cuz it was laggy

CONTROLS
  • L.Shift to Run
  • L.ALT to crouch and use hearing ability
  • E to stealthKill
STORY

Bandits have occupied your village and captured people inside their homes.. SNEAK DEEP into the forests and Kill all the bandits to save your people

TECH USED
  • Unity3D Game Engine
  • FLStudio 
  • Blender

The game was made for Ludum Dare 48 in 3 days

 
BEST EXPERIENCE if played in windows build
